UPDATE fina_project_account
balance_amount = #{balanceAmount},
deposit_total_payed = #{depositTotalPayed},
deposit_total_deduct = #{depositTotalDeduct},
modify_expect_amount = #{modifyExpectAmount},
modify_total_payed = #{modifyTotalPayed},
construct_expect_amount = #{constructExpectAmount},
construct_total_payed = #{constructTotalPayed},
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT fpa.deposit_total_deduct AS depositTotalDeduct, fpa.deposit_total_payed AS depositTotalPayed, fpa.modify_expect_amount AS modifyExpectAmount, fpa.modify_total_payed AS modifyTotalPayed, fpa.construct_expect_amount AS constructExpectAmount, fpa.construct_total_payed AS constructTotalPayed, fpm.changeAmount AS changeAmount, frm.reparationAmount AS reparationAmount FROM fina_project_account fpa LEFT JOIN ( SELECT contract_code, SUM(change_amount) AS changeAmount FROM fina_projectchange_money GROUP BY contract_code ) fpm ON fpm.contract_code = fpa.contract_code LEFT JOIN ( SELECT contract_code, SUM(reparation_amount) AS reparationAmount FROM fina_reparation_money GROUP BY contract_code ) frm ON frm.contract_code = fpa.contract_code
fpa.contract_uuid =#{contractUuid}
